description: Read-only Model Context Protocol MCP server enabling code-driven AI analysis of Kubernetes clusters.

KUBECONFIG.description: Path to kubeconfig file; defaults to ~/.kube/config if unset.

MCP_MODE.description: Server mode: 'all' (default), 'code', or 'tools'. Controls which features are enabled.

MCP_KUBE_CONTEXT.description: Kubernetes context name to use. If unset, uses the current context from kubeconfig.

MCP_K8S_SKIP_TLS_VERIFY.description: Skip TLS certificate verification for Kubernetes API (use 'true' or '1'). Not recommended for production.

MCP_HIDE_SENSITIVE.description: Enable global sensitive data masking. Set to 'true' or '1' to mask sensitive values in responses.

MCP_TIMEOUT.description: Default timeout in milliseconds for operations. If unset, uses plugin-specific defaults.

MCP_DISABLE_KUBERNETES_PLUGIN.description: Disable Kubernetes plugin. Set to 'true' or '1' to disable.

MCP_DISABLE_HELM_PLUGIN.description: Disable Helm plugin. Set to 'true' or '1' to disable.

MCP_DISABLE_ARGO_PLUGIN.description: Disable Argo Workflows plugin. Set to 'true' or '1' to disable.

MCP_DISABLE_ARGOCD_PLUGIN.description: Disable Argo CD plugin. Set to 'true' or '1' to disable.
